About Me

Let me tell you a little about myself and what I do...

Your In Safe Hands

My name is Thunbir Elahi. I am 25 years old of age and a father to a three year old. I am married to a very supportive and encouraging wife who helps and assists me in achieving my ambitions and goals in life. My passion, enthusiasm and motivation to the sudden change of direction in my career is directly related to my present role in which I have accumulated devotion for working with children

My hobbies and intrests

I enjoy participating in various activities such as horse riding, quad biking,holidays and water based activties. I am volunteer (senior campaigner) to do international charity work as it allows me to give back to the world. I am a big fan of netflix and bing watching in my spare time, I religously support the greatest team in the world Manchester United, I am a fan of Ultimate Fighting Champion.I have a passion for coding
